document.full_text: the wedding of britain's prince william to university sweetheart kate middleton will be streamed live on the internet via an official royal channel -- the first time a british royal wedding will be covered in this way.
document.title: royal wedding to be streamed live online
lines_and_colors: the wedding of britain's prince william to university sweetheart kate middleton will be streamed live on the internet via an official royal channel -- the first time a british royal wedding will be covered in this way.
